name: Luxfer Holdings PLC
description: Luxfer Holdings PLC is a global leader in the design and manufacture of advanced materials, specializing in the production of high-performance components for various industries. Founded in 1897 and headquartered in the United Kingdom, Luxfer focuses on developing innovative solutions that improve safety, performance, and efficiency. The company operates in two main segments: Gas Cylinders and Elektron. The Gas Cylinders segment produces lightweight, high-strength composite and aluminum cylinders for a range of applications, including industrial, medical, and aerospace sectors. The Elektron segment specializes in magnesium alloys and products that are used in automotive, aerospace, and defense applications. Luxfer is committed to sustainability and reducing environmental impact through the continued development of lightweight materials that enhance fuel efficiency and reduce emissions. The company's focus on research and development enables it to stay at the forefront of material science and engineering, providing customers with advanced solutions that meet their evolving needs. With a strong presence in international markets, Luxfer continues to expand its global footprint while maintaining high standards of quality and safety in its products.
